string-array.name: about
string-array.item: Foodbook app helps you to find near by location restaurants/bar/cafe and view the details about the items and navigate to the location. App also helps you to mark the favorite food place.

string-array.name: features
string-array.item:
- Read reviews about the place
 - Write reviews using Google+ account
 - Navigate to the location found
 - Share the details
 - Mark as Favorite
 - View Map

string-array.name: permissions
string-array.item: Access device location to identity the current location.\n Network to retrieve date from Google Place Service.\n Access device storage to mark favorites

string-array.name: next
string-array.item: Capture your favorite food as picture or video. \nGuide you with near by recipes based on your favorite place
